full_summary:
**Tender Notice: QNAP and Seagate Hardware**

# Overview of Tender Notice
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide QNAP and Seagate hardware, or equivalent, for Fisheries and Oceans Canada (FOC) in Quebec City, Quebec.

## Solicitation Details
* **Procurement Number:** SSC-24-00025323:T
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM020668/25323
* **Publication Date:** 2024-01-26
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-02-05, 14:00:00 EST
* **Classification:** ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices (N7025)
* **Countries of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria
The procurement method is competitive open bidding. The evaluation criteria include, but are not limited to, pricing.

## Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents, including the Request for Quotations, can be downloaded from [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/DAE7EAB6-E835-41CE-938F-9D4AD46048A2) and [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/FFDF3F82-6CDB-4DCD-8C5C-BFFC59F6DCC8).

## Tender Requirements
Bid submissions must be made electronically using the Contracting Authority's email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances. Suppliers must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.

## Selection and Award
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. CSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Important Notice regarding Presentation of Bids
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email.

Bids submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French) will be accepted. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of their bid submissions.

**Additional Information**
For more information, please contact Agnes Kowalska at 343-551-9034 or [insert email contact].

I
